subject: Update mobile web gesture handling to use tap-to-react Changed mobile web message bubble interaction to open reaction picker directly on tap, while long-press still opens full action sheet. This improves reliability on mobile web where tap gestures were conflicting with scrolling.
body:
Add onQuickReact prop to MessageBubble for mobile web tap-to-react
Modify MessageBubbleWeb to prioritize quick react over action sheet on tap
Add ReactionPicker modal to chat screen for quick emoji selection
Desktop web behavior unchanged (click/right-click opens action sheet)
title: Update mobile web gesture handling to use tap-to-react Changed mobile web message bubble interaction to open reaction picker directly on tap, while long-press still opens full action sheet. This improves reliability on mobile web where tap gestures were conflicting with scrolling.
